law.text: In the event the referendum is carried in the affirmative and the assessment is levied and collected as provided, any producer upon and against whom the assessment shall have been levied and collected under the provisions of KRS 247.710 to 247.785, if dissatisfied with the assessment and the result thereof, shall have the right to demand of and receive from the treasurer of the certified association a refund of the assessment so collected from the producer; provided, the demand for refund is made in writing within thirty (30) days from the date on which the assessment is collected from the producer.
